content.raw:
Could you elaborate on what your setup is where you’re seeing these errors? On Ubuntu 18.04, I’ve tried building with both GCC and Clang in Debug, Release, and RelWithDebInfo modes, and none of those combinations are producing any kind of exception, seg fault, or any teardown issue on any of the tests.

Also, nothing about memory, storage, or data of any kind is being affected by these changes. The only thing that’s changing is the inheritance structure, but all objects in that inheritance structure are empty.
content.html:
Could you elaborate on what your setup is where you’re seeing these errors? On Ubuntu 18.04, I’ve tried building with both GCC and Clang in Debug, Release, and RelWithDebInfo modes, and none of those combinations are producing any kind of exception, seg fault, or any teardown issue on any of the tests.

Also, nothing about memory, storage, or data of any kind is being affected by these changes. The only thing that’s changing is the inheritance structure, but all objects in that inheritance structure are empty.
